mainboard.name: Caretaker's Talent
mainboard.oracle_text:
(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
Whenever one or more tokens you control enter, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
{W}: Level 2
When this Class becomes level 2, create a token that's a copy of target token you control.
{3}{W}: Level 3
Creature tokens you control get +2/+2.

mainboard.name: Day of Judgment
mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures.

mainboard.name: Journey to Nowhere
mainboard.oracle_text:
When this enchantment enters, exile target creature.
When this enchantment leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

mainboard.name: Luminarch Aspirant
mainboard.oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

mainboard.name: Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flash
Whenever Phelia attacks, exile up to one other target nonland permanent. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If it entered under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Phelia.

mainboard.name: Wrath of God
mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

mainboard.name: Cryogen Relic
mainboard.oracle_text:
When this artifact enters or leaves the battlefield, draw a card.
{1}{U}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a stun counter on up to one target tapped creature. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

mainboard.name: Shark Typhoon
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create an X/X blue Shark creature token with flying, where X is that spell's mana value.
Cycling {X}{1}{U} ({X}{1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle this card, create an X/X blue Shark creature token with flying.

mainboard.name: Agonizing Remorse
mainboard.oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it or a card from their graveyard. Exile that card. You lose 1 life.

mainboard.name: Bone Shards
mainboard.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or discard a card.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

mainboard.name: Fell
mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy target creature.

mainboard.name: Grim Bauble
mainboard.oracle_text:
When this artifact enters, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
{2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

mainboard.name: Lord Skitter, Sewer King
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever another Rat you control enters, exile up to one target card from an opponent's graveyard.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 black Rat creature token with "This token can't block."

mainboard.name: Marionette Apprentice
mainboard.oracle_text:
Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)
Whenever another creature or artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life.

mainboard.name: Rankle, Master of Pranks
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying, haste
Whenever Rankle deals combat damage to a player, choose any number —
• Each player discards a card.
• Each player loses 1 life and draws a card.
• Each player sacrifices a creature of their choice.

mainboard.name: Sedgemoor Witch
mainboard.oracle_text:
Menace
Ward—Pay 3 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 3 life.)
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this token dies, you gain 1 life."

mainboard.name: Lotus Cobra
mainboard.oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, add one mana of any color.

mainboard.name: Primeval Titan
mainboard.oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever this creature enters or attacks, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Tireless Tracker
mainboard.oracle_text:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.")
Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

mainboard.name: Growth Spiral
mainboard.oracle_text: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

mainboard.name: The Goose Mother
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
The Goose Mother enters with X +1/+1 counters on it.
When The Goose Mother enters, create half X Food tokens, rounded up.
Whenever The Goose Mother attacks, you may sacrifice a Food. If you do, draw a card.

mainboard.name: Ravenous Squirrel
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact or creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
{1}{B}{G}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

mainboard.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
{3}{W}{U}: Until end of turn, this land becomes a 4/4 white and blue Elemental creature with flying and vigilance. It's still a land.

sideboard.name: Delney, Streetwise Lookout
sideboard.oracle_text:
Creatures you control with power 2 or less can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
If an ability of a creature you control with power 2 or less triggers, that ability triggers an additional time.

sideboard.name: Spirited Companion
sideboard.oracle_text: When this creature enters, draw a card.

sideboard.name: Cling to Dust
sideboard.oracle_text:
Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, you gain 3 life. Otherwise, you draw a card.
Escape—{3}{B}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

sideboard.name: Grim Discovery
sideboard.oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

sideboard.name: Knight of the Ebon Legion
sideboard.oracle_text:
{2}{B}: This creature gets +3/+3 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if a player lost 4 or more life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. (Damage causes loss of life.)

sideboard.name: Verdurous Gearhulk
sideboard.oracle_text:
Trample
When this creature enters, distribute four +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control.

sideboard.name: Tidehollow Sculler
sideboard.oracle_text:
When this creature enters, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.

sideboard.name: Grim Flayer
sideboard.oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, surveil 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
Delirium — This creature gets +2/+2 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
